Complete AI-powered Link Saver + Notes Board with drag-and-drop

Features implemented:

- Beautiful sticky note UI with color palette (8 colors)
- Enhanced link cards with platform and category badges
- Full CRUD operations for notes and links
- MongoDB integration with optimized schemas
- Gemini AI integration for metadata extraction
- Real-time note positioning and z-index management
- Responsive design with Framer Motion animations
- Backend API with Express + MongoDB
- Frontend with Next.js 16 + React 19 + Tailwind CSS

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React-DND
- Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose
- AI: Google Gemini API for categorization
- Web Scraping: Axios + Cheerio
